projects.title: Colorator
projects.description: A self-initiated project to build / design a colour palette tool. I used React to make a dynamic front-end, and Laravel to create an API to manage users saved palettes. The application allows a user to randomly generate a colour palette, with  additional functionality to control customisation and help create / store their ideal palette(s)!

projects.title: My-Records
projects.description: A collection app that allows a user to maintain and show off their record collection. Created using OOP principles with vanilla PHP and a MySQL database, without a framework in order to gain a deeper understanding of CRUD operations. This was an individual project with pull request reviews required upon the completion of each story. Fully unit tested.
